summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE.  THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 19V813000 (ELECTRICAL SYSTEM) HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE RECALL REPAIR WAS NOT YET AVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER HAD EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 15 MPH AND APPROACHING AN INTERSECTION OR STOP SIGN, THE VEHICLE HESITATED TO ACCELERATE WITHOUT WARNING WITH THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL DEPRESSED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. SAFFORD CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM OF SALISBURY (1915 N SALISBURY BLVD SALISBURY, MD 21801, (888) 867-9096) AND THE MANUFACTURER WERE NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 189,000. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.*DT*JB
